alert.note: Alert for Parker; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 02 at 6:28PM CDT until April 02 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN WISE AND NORTHEASTERN PARKER COUNTIES... At 628 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Poolville, or 12 miles south of Bridgeport, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Azle, Briar, Pecan Acres, Reno, Springtown, Rhome, New Fairview, Aurora, Boyd, Poolville, Paradise, Newark, Sanctuary, La Junta, Advance, Cottondale, Keeter, Balsora, Agnes and Boonsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central Texas.
